laboratory_examinations.findings: The gas and fluid collection medial to the sigmoid measures 4.1 x 3.8 x 4.5 cm, significantly smaller compared to a previous measurement of 3.2 x 2.4 x 2.9 cm. A smaller fluid collection to the right measures 2.3 x 2.1 cm and is unchanged from prior. Residual intra-abdominal free air is slightly decreased in size compared to the previous exam.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The main fluid collection has decreased in size, while the smaller fluid collection is unchanged.
